item.title: Spaces Protocol | Scalable & Permissionless Bitcoin Identities
item.description: Spaces Protocol Scalable & Permissionless Bitcoin Identities Spaces is a naming protocol that leverages the existing infrastructure and security of Bitcoin without requiring a new blockchain or any modifications to Bitcoin itself. Spaces is a permissionless protocol and can be used as decentralized social handles for Nostr, receiving payments and other digital interactions. On-chain Spaces are represented as Bitcoin UTXOs, they take full advantage of Bitcoin’s security, and have minimal on-chain footprint.
